import random
from pyeasyga import pyeasyga
import matplotlib
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

def create_individual(data):
    individual = data[:]
    random.shuffle(individual)
    return individual

def crossover(parent_1, parent_2):
    crossover_index = random.randrange(1, len(parent_1))
    child_1a = parent_1[:crossover_index]
    child_1b = [i for i in parent_2 if i not in child_1a]
    child_1 = child_1a + child_1b
    child_2a = parent_2[crossover_index:]
    child_2b = [i for i in parent_1 if i not in child_2a]
    child_2 = child_2a + child_2b
    return child_1, child_2

def mutate(individual):
    mutate_index1 = random.randrange(len(individual))
    mutate_index2 = random.randrange(len(individual))
    individual[mutate_index1], individual[mutate_index2] = individual[mutate_index2], individual[mutate_index1]


def selection(population):
    return random.choice(population)


def fitness (individual, data):
    collisions = 0
    for item in individual:
        item_index = individual.index(item)
        for elem in individual:
            elem_index = individual.index(elem)
            if item_index != elem_index:
                if item - (elem_index - item_index) == elem or (elem_index - item_index) + item == elem:
                    collisions += 1
    return collisions

def print_board(board_representation):
    def print_x_in_row(row_length, x_position):
        print('', end = '')
        for _ in range(row_length):
            print('---', end = '')
        print('\n|', end = '')
        for i in range(row_length):
            if i == x_position:
                print('{} |'.format('X'), end = '')
            else:
                print('  |', end = '')
        print('')

    def print_board_bottom(row_length):
        print('', end = '')
        for _ in range(row_length):
            print('---', end = '')

    num_of_rows = len(board_representation)
    row_length = num_of_rows  

    for row in range(num_of_rows):
        print_x_in_row(row_length, board_representation[row])

    print_board_bottom(row_length)
    print('\n', end = '')

def datos_generacion():
    fitness_po = [i.fitness for i in ga.current_generation]
    average = sum(fitness_po)/len(fitness_po)
    print("Fitness promedio:{} ".format(average))
    print("Mejor Individuo: {}".format(ga.best_individual()))
    return average

representacion = [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7]
ga = pyeasyga.GeneticAlgorithm(representacion,
                            population_size=200,
                            generations=100,
                            crossover_probability=0.8,
                            mutation_probability=0.2,
                            elitism=True,
                            maximise_fitness=False)

ga.create_individual = create_individual
ga.crossover_function = crossover
ga.mutate_function = mutate
ga.selection_function = selection
ga.fitness_function = fitness  
ga.create_first_generation()
ga.run()

ejemplo1 = []

for i in range(1, 10):
    print("Generacion #{}".format(i))
    ga.create_next_generation()
    ejemplo1.append(datos_generacion())

print(ejemplo1)

representacion = [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7]
ga = pyeasyga.GeneticAlgorithm(representacion,
                            population_size=100,
                            generations=500,
                            crossover_probability=0.4,
                            mutation_probability=0.25,
                            elitism=False,
                            maximise_fitness=True)

ga.create_individual = create_individual
ga.crossover_function = crossover
ga.mutate_function = mutate
ga.selection_function = selection
ga.fitness_function = fitness       
ga.create_first_generation()
ga.run()
ejemplo2 = []

for i in range(1, 10):
    print("Generacion #{}".format(i))
    ga.create_next_generation()
    ejemplo2.append(datos_generacion())
   
print(ejemplo2)

representacion = [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7]
ga = pyeasyga.GeneticAlgorithm(representacion,
                            population_size=100,
                            generations=100,
                            crossover_probability=0.8,
                            mutation_probability=0.8,
                            elitism=False,
                            maximise_fitness=False)

ga.create_individual = create_individual
ga.crossover_function = crossover
ga.mutate_function = mutate
ga.selection_function = selection
ga.fitness_function = fitness       
ga.create_first_generation()
ga.run()
ejemplo3 = []

for i in range(1, 10):
    print("Generacion #{}".format(i))
    ga.create_next_generation()
    ejemplo3.append(datos_generacion())
   
print(ejemplo3)

representacion = [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7]
ga = pyeasyga.GeneticAlgorithm(representacion,
                            population_size=200,
                            generations=100,
                            crossover_probability=1,
                            mutation_probability=1,
                            elitism=True,
                            maximise_fitness=False)

ga.create_individual = create_individual
ga.crossover_function = crossover
ga.mutate_function = mutate
ga.selection_function = selection
ga.fitness_function = fitness       
ga.create_first_generation()
ga.run()
ejemplo4 = []

for i in range(1, 10):
    print("Generacion #{}".format(i))
    ga.create_next_generation()
    ejemplo4.append(datos_generacion())
   
print(ejemplo4)

labels = ['G1', 'G2', 'G3', 'G4', 'G5','G6', 'G7', 'G8', 'G9']
plt.plot(labels, ejemplo1,'o-', labels, ejemplo2,'o-', labels, ejemplo3,'o-',labels, ejemplo4,'o-')
plt.title('Evolución fitness de la población con parametros distintos')
plt.xlabel('Generacion')
plt.ylabel('Fitness promedio')
plt.legend(('Ejemplo1', 'Ejemplo2', 'Ejemplo2','Ejemplo4'))
plt.grid(True)
plt.show()
Para este punto debemos instalar la libreria matplotlib con los comandos (pip install -U pip) y  (pip install -U matplotlib)
Segundo Punto

import random
from pyeasyga import pyeasyga
import matplotlib
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

def create_individual(data):
    individual = data[:]
    random.shuffle(individual)
    return individual

def crossover(parent_1, parent_2):
    crossover_index = random.randrange(1, len(parent_1))
    child_1a = parent_1[:crossover_index]
    child_1b = [i for i in parent_2 if i not in child_1a]
    child_1 = child_1a + child_1b
    child_2a = parent_2[crossover_index:]
    child_2b = [i for i in parent_1 if i not in child_2a]
    child_2 = child_2a + child_2b
    return child_1, child_2

def mutate(individual):
    mutate_index1 = random.randrange(len(individual))
    mutate_index2 = random.randrange(len(individual))
    individual[mutate_index1], individual[mutate_index2] = individual[mutate_index2], individual[mutate_index1]


def selection(population):
    return random.choice(population)


def fitness (individual, data):
    collisions = 0
    for item in individual:
        item_index = individual.index(item)
        for elem in individual:
            elem_index = individual.index(elem)
            if item_index != elem_index:
                if item - (elem_index - item_index) == elem or (elem_index - item_index) + item == elem:
                    collisions += 1
    return collisions

def print_board(board_representation):
    def print_x_in_row(row_length, x_position):
        print('', end = '')
        for _ in range(row_length):
            print('---', end = '')
        print('\n|', end = '')
        for i in range(row_length):
            if i == x_position:
                print('{} |'.format('X'), end = '')
            else:
                print('  |', end = '')
        print('')

    def print_board_bottom(row_length):
        print('', end = '')
        for _ in range(row_length):
            print('---', end = '')

    num_of_rows = len(board_representation)
    row_length = num_of_rows    #rows == columns in a chessboard

    for row in range(num_of_rows):
        print_x_in_row(row_length, board_representation[row])

    print_board_bottom(row_length)
   # print('\n', end = '')

def datos_generacion():
    fitness_po = [i.fitness for i in ga.current_generation]
    average = sum(fitness_po)/len(fitness_po)
    print("Fitness promedio:{} ".format(average))
    print("Mejor Individuo: {}".format(ga.best_individual()))
    
    return average

representacion = [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7]
ga = pyeasyga.GeneticAlgorithm(representacion,
                            population_size=200,
                            generations=100,
                            crossover_probability=0.8,
                            mutation_probability=0.2,
                            elitism=True,
                            maximise_fitness=False)

ga.create_individual = create_individual
ga.crossover_function = crossover
ga.mutate_function = mutate
ga.selection_function = selection
ga.fitness_function = fitness    
ga.create_first_generation()
ga.run()

labels = []
ejemplo1 = []
ejemplo2 = []

for i in range(1, 10):
    labels.append("G#{}".format(i))
    print("Generacion #{}".format(i))
    ga.create_next_generation()
    ejemplo1.append(datos_generacion())
    ejemplo2.append( sum(ga.best_individual()[1])/len(ga.best_individual()[1]) )

print(ejemplo1)
print(ejemplo2)
print(labels)
fig, axs = plt.subplots(1, 2, figsize=(9, 2), sharey=True)
axs[0].plot(labels, ejemplo1,'o-')
axs[1].plot(labels, ejemplo2,'o-')
fig.suptitle('Fitness por generación                            Fitness del mejor individuo')
plt.show()

import random
from pyeasyga import pyeasyga
import matplotlib
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

def create_individual(data):
    individual = data[:]
    random.shuffle(individual)
    return individual

def crossover(parent_1, parent_2):
    crossover_index = random.randrange(1, len(parent_1))
    child_1a = parent_1[:crossover_index]
    child_1b = [i for i in parent_2 if i not in child_1a]
    child_1 = child_1a + child_1b
    child_2a = parent_2[crossover_index:]
    child_2b = [i for i in parent_1 if i not in child_2a]
    child_2 = child_2a + child_2b
    return child_1, child_2

def mutate(individual):
    mutate_index1 = random.randrange(len(individual))
    mutate_index2 = random.randrange(len(individual))
    individual[mutate_index1], individual[mutate_index2] = individual[mutate_index2], individual[mutate_index1]


def selection(population):
    return random.choice(population)


def fitness (individual, data):
    collisions = 0
    for item in individual:
        item_index = individual.index(item)
        for elem in individual:
            elem_index = individual.index(elem)
            if item_index != elem_index:
                if item - (elem_index - item_index) == elem or (elem_index - item_index) + item == elem:
                    collisions += 1
    return collisions

def print_board(board_representation):
    def print_x_in_row(row_length, x_position):
        print('', end = '')
        for _ in range(row_length):
            print('---', end = '')
        print('\n|', end = '')
        for i in range(row_length):
            if i == x_position:
                print('{} |'.format('X'), end = '')
            else:
                print('  |', end = '')
        print('')

    def print_board_bottom(row_length):
        print('', end = '')
        for _ in range(row_length):
            print('---', end = '')

    num_of_rows = len(board_representation)
    row_length = num_of_rows    #rows == columns in a chessboard

    for row in range(num_of_rows):
        print_x_in_row(row_length, board_representation[row])

    print_board_bottom(row_length)
    print('\n', end = '')

def datos_generacion():
    fitness_po = [i.fitness for i in ga.current_generation]
    average = sum(fitness_po)/len(fitness_po)
    print("Fitness promedio:{} ".format(average))
    print("Mejor Individuo: {}".format(ga.best_individual()))
    return average

representacion = [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7]
ga = pyeasyga.GeneticAlgorithm(representacion,
                            population_size=10,
                            generations=100,
                            crossover_probability=0.8,
                            mutation_probability=0.2,
                            elitism=True,
                            maximise_fitness=False)

ga.create_individual = create_individual
ga.crossover_function = crossover
ga.mutate_function = mutate
ga.selection_function = selection
ga.fitness_function = fitness  
ga.create_first_generation()
ga.run()

ejemplo1 = []

for i in range(1, 10):
    print("Generacion #{}".format(i))
    ga.create_next_generation()
    ejemplo1.append(datos_generacion())

print(ejemplo1)

representacion = [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7]
ga = pyeasyga.GeneticAlgorithm(representacion,
                            population_size=50,
                            generations=100,
                            crossover_probability=0.8,
                            mutation_probability=0.2,
                            elitism=True,
                            maximise_fitness=False)

ga.create_individual = create_individual
ga.crossover_function = crossover
ga.mutate_function = mutate
ga.selection_function = selection
ga.fitness_function = fitness       
ga.create_first_generation()
ga.run()
ejemplo2 = []

for i in range(1, 10):
    print("Generacion #{}".format(i))
    ga.create_next_generation()
    ejemplo2.append(datos_generacion())
   
print(ejemplo2)

representacion = [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7]
ga = pyeasyga.GeneticAlgorithm(representacion,
                            population_size=100,
                            generations=100,
                            crossover_probability=0.8,
                            mutation_probability=0.2,
                            elitism=True,
                            maximise_fitness=False)

ga.create_individual = create_individual
ga.crossover_function = crossover
ga.mutate_function = mutate
ga.selection_function = selection
ga.fitness_function = fitness       
ga.create_first_generation()
ga.run()
ejemplo3 = []

for i in range(1, 10):
    print("Generacion #{}".format(i))
    ga.create_next_generation()
    ejemplo3.append(datos_generacion())
   
print(ejemplo3)

representacion = [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7]
ga = pyeasyga.GeneticAlgorithm(representacion,
                            population_size=500,
                            generations=100,
                            crossover_probability=0.8,
                            mutation_probability=0.2,
                            elitism=True,
                            maximise_fitness=False)

ga.create_individual = create_individual
ga.crossover_function = crossover
ga.mutate_function = mutate
ga.selection_function = selection
ga.fitness_function = fitness       
ga.create_first_generation()
ga.run()
ejemplo4 = []

for i in range(1, 10):
    print("Generacion #{}".format(i))
    ga.create_next_generation()
    ejemplo4.append(datos_generacion())
   
print(ejemplo4)

labels = ['G1', 'G2', 'G3', 'G4', 'G5','G6', 'G7', 'G8', 'G9']

plt.plot(labels, ejemplo1,'o-', labels, ejemplo2,'o-', labels, ejemplo3,'o-', labels, ejemplo4,'o-')
plt.legend(('10', '50', '100','500'))
plt.title('Fitness promedio de la población')
plt.xlabel('Generacion')
plt.ylabel('Fitness promedio')
plt.grid(True)
plt.show()

Los algoritmos géneticos trabajan con población de individuos los cuales representa una 
solución factible a un problema dado. Entre mayor sea la población va a ser mayor la cantidad 
de caracteristicas en comparación con una población pequeña, favoreciendo el cruce de individuos
mejor adaptados.

import random
from pyeasyga import pyeasyga
import matplotlib
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

def create_individual(data):
    individual = data[:]
    random.shuffle(individual)
    return individual

def crossover(parent_1, parent_2):
    crossover_index = random.randrange(1, len(parent_1))
    child_1a = parent_1[:crossover_index]
    child_1b = [i for i in parent_2 if i not in child_1a]
    child_1 = child_1a + child_1b
    child_2a = parent_2[crossover_index:]
    child_2b = [i for i in parent_1 if i not in child_2a]
    child_2 = child_2a + child_2b
    return child_1, child_2

def mutate(individual):
    mutate_index1 = random.randrange(len(individual))
    mutate_index2 = random.randrange(len(individual))
    individual[mutate_index1], individual[mutate_index2] = individual[mutate_index2], individual[mutate_index1]

def selection(population):
    return random.choice(population)

def fitness (individual, data):
    collisions = 0
    for item in individual:
        item_index = individual.index(item)
        for elem in individual:
            elem_index = individual.index(elem)
            if item_index != elem_index:
                if item - (elem_index - item_index) == elem or (elem_index - item_index) + item == elem:
                    collisions += 1
    return collisions

def print_board(board_representation):
    def print_x_in_row(row_length, x_position):
        print('', end = '')
        for _ in range(row_length):
            print('---', end = '')
        print('\n|', end = '')
        for i in range(row_length):
            if i == x_position:
                print('{} |'.format('X'), end = '')
            else:
                print('  |', end = '')
        print('')

    def print_board_bottom(row_length):
        print('', end = '')
        for _ in range(row_length):
            print('---', end = '')

    num_of_rows = len(board_representation)
    row_length = num_of_rows 

    for row in range(num_of_rows):
        print_x_in_row(row_length, board_representation[row])

    print_board_bottom(row_length)
    print('\n', end = '')

def datos_generacion():
    fitness_po = [i.fitness for i in ga.current_generation]
    average = sum(fitness_po)/len(fitness_po)
    print("Fitness promedio:{} ".format(average))
    print("Mejor Individuo: {}".format(ga.best_individual()))
    
    return average

representacion = [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7]
ga = pyeasyga.GeneticAlgorithm(representacion,
                            population_size=200,
                            generations=100,
                            crossover_probability=0.8,
                            mutation_probability=0.2,
                            elitism=False,
                            maximise_fitness=False)

ga.create_individual = create_individual
ga.crossover_function = crossover
ga.mutate_function = mutate
ga.selection_function = selection
ga.fitness_function = fitness  
ga.create_first_generation()
ga.run()

labels = []
ejemplo1 = []

for i in range(1, 10):
    labels.append("G#{}".format(i))
    print("Generacion #{}".format(i))
    ga.create_next_generation()
    ejemplo1.append(datos_generacion())

print(ejemplo1)
print(labels)

plt.plot(ejemplo1,'o-',linewidth=1,color="g")
plt.title('Fitness por generacion sin elitismo')
plt.xlabel('Generacion sin elitismo')
plt.ylabel('Fitness promedio')
plt.grid()
plt.show()

El elitismo se encarga de evitar que se pierda la mejor solución por lo que una variación o cambio
en este hará que la calidad de una solución obtenida disminuira en una nueva generación, es decir, 
sin el elitismo los mejores organismos de una generación no se podrán trasladar a uno nuevo.
Quinto Punto

source:
import random
from pyeasyga import pyeasyga
import matplotlib
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

def create_individual(data):
    individual = data[:]
    random.shuffle(individual)
    return individual

def crossover(parent_1, parent_2):
    crossover_index = random.randrange(1, len(parent_1))
    child_1a = parent_1[:crossover_index]
    child_1b = [i for i in parent_2 if i not in child_1a]
    child_1 = child_1a + child_1b
    child_2a = parent_2[crossover_index:]
    child_2b = [i for i in parent_1 if i not in child_2a]
    child_2 = child_2a + child_2b
    return child_1, child_2

def mutate(individual):
    mutate_index1 = random.randrange(len(individual))
    mutate_index2 = random.randrange(len(individual))
    individual[mutate_index1], individual[mutate_index2] = individual[mutate_index2], individual[mutate_index1]


def selection(population):
    return random.choice(population)


def fitness (individual, data):
    collisions = 0
    for item in individual:
        item_index = individual.index(item)
        for elem in individual:
            elem_index = individual.index(elem)
            if item_index != elem_index:
                if item - (elem_index - item_index) == elem or (elem_index - item_index) + item == elem:
                    collisions += 1
    return collisions

def print_board(board_representation):
    def print_x_in_row(row_length, x_position):
        print('', end = '')
        for _ in range(row_length):
            print('---', end = '')
        print('\n|', end = '')
        for i in range(row_length):
            if i == x_position:
                print('{} |'.format('X'), end = '')
            else:
                print('  |', end = '')
        print('')

    def print_board_bottom(row_length):
        print('', end = '')
        for _ in range(row_length):
            print('---', end = '')

    num_of_rows = len(board_representation)
    row_length = num_of_rows    #rows == columns in a chessboard

    for row in range(num_of_rows):
        print_x_in_row(row_length, board_representation[row])

    print_board_bottom(row_length)
    print('\n', end = '')

def datos_generacion():
    fitness_po = [i.fitness for i in ga.current_generation]
    average = sum(fitness_po)/len(fitness_po)
    print("Fitness promedio:{} ".format(average))
    print("Mejor Individuo: {}".format(ga.best_individual()))
    return average

representacion = [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7]
# Vamos a utilizar la librería pyeasyga que se encarga de los procesos de iteración del algoritmo. Creamos una instancia de la clase.
ga = pyeasyga.GeneticAlgorithm(representacion,
                            population_size=200,
                            generations=100,
                            crossover_probability=0.1,
                            mutation_probability=0.2,
                            elitism=True,
                            maximise_fitness=False)

ga.create_individual = create_individual
ga.crossover_function = crossover
ga.mutate_function = mutate
ga.selection_function = selection
ga.fitness_function = fitness  
ga.create_first_generation()
ga.run()

ejemplo1 = []

for i in range(1, 10):
    print("Generacion #{}".format(i))
    ga.create_next_generation()
    ejemplo1.append(datos_generacion())

print(ejemplo1)

representacion = [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7]
ga = pyeasyga.GeneticAlgorithm(representacion,
                            population_size=200,
                            generations=100,
                            crossover_probability=0.5,
                            mutation_probability=0.2,
                            elitism=True,
                            maximise_fitness=False)

ga.create_individual = create_individual
ga.crossover_function = crossover
ga.mutate_function = mutate
ga.selection_function = selection
ga.fitness_function = fitness       
ga.create_first_generation()
ga.run()
ejemplo2 = []

for i in range(1, 10):
    print("Generacion #{}".format(i))
    ga.create_next_generation()
    ejemplo2.append(datos_generacion())
   
print(ejemplo2)

representacion = [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7]
ga = pyeasyga.GeneticAlgorithm(representacion,
                            population_size=100,
                            generations=100,
                            crossover_probability=0.8,
                            mutation_probability=0.2,
                            elitism=True,
                            maximise_fitness=False)

ga.create_individual = create_individual
ga.crossover_function = crossover
ga.mutate_function = mutate
ga.selection_function = selection
ga.fitness_function = fitness       
ga.create_first_generation()
ga.run()
ejemplo3 = []

for i in range(1, 10):
    print("Generacion #{}".format(i))
    ga.create_next_generation()
    ejemplo3.append(datos_generacion())
   
print(ejemplo3)

representacion = [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7]
ga = pyeasyga.GeneticAlgorithm(representacion,
                            population_size=100,
                            generations=100,
                            crossover_probability=1,
                            mutation_probability=0.2,
                            elitism=True,
                            maximise_fitness=False)

ga.create_individual = create_individual
ga.crossover_function = crossover
ga.mutate_function = mutate
ga.selection_function = selection
ga.fitness_function = fitness       
ga.create_first_generation()
ga.run()
ejemplo4 = []

for i in range(1, 10):
    print("Generacion #{}".format(i))
    ga.create_next_generation()
    ejemplo4.append(datos_generacion())
   
print(ejemplo4)

labels = ['G1', 'G2', 'G3', 'G4', 'G5','G6', 'G7', 'G8', 'G9']
plt.plot(labels, ejemplo1,'o-', labels, ejemplo2,'o-', labels, ejemplo3,'o-',labels, ejemplo4,'o-')
plt.title('Fitness promedio crossover')
plt.xlabel('Generacion')
plt.ylabel('Fitness promedio')
plt.legend(('0.1', '0.5', '0.8','1'))
plt.grid(True)
plt.show()

Entre mayor es la probabilidad del crossover mayor será el uso de soluciones, reduciendo la
psobilidad de establecerse en un optimo falso. En caso de que esta probabilidad sea muy alta se genera un
desperdicio de tiempo explorando regiones no prometedoras.
Sexto Punto

import random
from pyeasyga import pyeasyga
import matplotlib
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

def create_individual(data):
    individual = data[:]
    random.shuffle(individual)
    return individual

def crossover(parent_1, parent_2):
    crossover_index = random.randrange(1, len(parent_1))
    child_1a = parent_1[:crossover_index]
    child_1b = [i for i in parent_2 if i not in child_1a]
    child_1 = child_1a + child_1b
    child_2a = parent_2[crossover_index:]
    child_2b = [i for i in parent_1 if i not in child_2a]
    child_2 = child_2a + child_2b
    return child_1, child_2

def mutate(individual):
    mutate_index1 = random.randrange(len(individual))
    mutate_index2 = random.randrange(len(individual))
    individual[mutate_index1], individual[mutate_index2] = individual[mutate_index2], individual[mutate_index1]


def selection(population):
    return random.choice(population)


def fitness (individual, data):
    collisions = 0
    for item in individual:
        item_index = individual.index(item)
        for elem in individual:
            elem_index = individual.index(elem)
            if item_index != elem_index:
                if item - (elem_index - item_index) == elem or (elem_index - item_index) + item == elem:
                    collisions += 1
    return collisions

def print_board(board_representation):
    def print_x_in_row(row_length, x_position):
        print('', end = '')
        for _ in range(row_length):
            print('---', end = '')
        print('\n|', end = '')
        for i in range(row_length):
            if i == x_position:
                print('{} |'.format('X'), end = '')
            else:
                print('  |', end = '')
        print('')

    def print_board_bottom(row_length):
        print('', end = '')
        for _ in range(row_length):
            print('---', end = '')

    num_of_rows = len(board_representation)
    row_length = num_of_rows  

    for row in range(num_of_rows):
        print_x_in_row(row_length, board_representation[row])

    print_board_bottom(row_length)
    print('\n', end = '')

def datos_generacion():
    fitness_po = [i.fitness for i in ga.current_generation]
    average = sum(fitness_po)/len(fitness_po)
    print("Fitness promedio:{} ".format(average))
    print("Mejor Individuo: {}".format(ga.best_individual()))
    return average

representacion = [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7]
ga = pyeasyga.GeneticAlgorithm(representacion,
                            population_size=200,
                            generations=100,
                            crossover_probability=0.8,
                            mutation_probability=0.2,
                            elitism=True,
                            maximise_fitness=False)

ga.create_individual = create_individual
ga.crossover_function = crossover
ga.mutate_function = mutate
ga.selection_function = selection
ga.fitness_function = fitness  
ga.create_first_generation()
ga.run()

ejemplo1 = []

for i in range(1, 10):
    print("Generacion #{}".format(i))
    ga.create_next_generation()
    ejemplo1.append(datos_generacion())

print(ejemplo1)

representacion = [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7]
ga = pyeasyga.GeneticAlgorithm(representacion,
                            population_size=200,
                            generations=100,
                            crossover_probability=0.8,
                            mutation_probability=0.5,
                            elitism=True,
                            maximise_fitness=False)

ga.create_individual = create_individual
ga.crossover_function = crossover
ga.mutate_function = mutate
ga.selection_function = selection
ga.fitness_function = fitness       
ga.create_first_generation()
ga.run()
ejemplo2 = []

for i in range(1, 10):
    print("Generacion #{}".format(i))
    ga.create_next_generation()
    ejemplo2.append(datos_generacion())
   
print(ejemplo2)

representacion = [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7]
ga = pyeasyga.GeneticAlgorithm(representacion,
                            population_size=100,
                            generations=100,
                            crossover_probability=0.8,
                            mutation_probability=0.8,
                            elitism=True,
                            maximise_fitness=False)

ga.create_individual = create_individual
ga.crossover_function = crossover
ga.mutate_function = mutate
ga.selection_function = selection
ga.fitness_function = fitness       
ga.create_first_generation()
ga.run()
ejemplo3 = []

for i in range(1, 10):
    print("Generacion #{}".format(i))
    ga.create_next_generation()
    ejemplo3.append(datos_generacion())
   
print(ejemplo3)

representacion = [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7]
ga = pyeasyga.GeneticAlgorithm(representacion,
                            population_size=100,
                            generations=100,
                            crossover_probability=0.8,
                            mutation_probability=1,
                            elitism=True,
                            maximise_fitness=False)

ga.create_individual = create_individual
ga.crossover_function = crossover
ga.mutate_function = mutate
ga.selection_function = selection
ga.fitness_function = fitness       
ga.create_first_generation()
ga.run()
ejemplo4 = []

for i in range(1, 10):
    print("Generacion #{}".format(i))
    ga.create_next_generation()
    ejemplo4.append(datos_generacion())
   
print(ejemplo4)

labels = ['G1', 'G2', 'G3', 'G4', 'G5','G6', 'G7', 'G8', 'G9']
plt.plot(labels, ejemplo1,'o-', labels, ejemplo2,'o-', labels, ejemplo3,'o-',labels, ejemplo4,'o-')
plt.title('Fitness promedio mutacion')
plt.xlabel('Generacion')
plt.ylabel('Fitness promedio')
plt.legend(('0.2', '0.5', '0.8','1'))
plt.grid(True)
plt.show()

Entre mayor es la probabilidad de mutación, los individuos nuevos van a perder parecido
con los individuos "padres". Pero si la probabilidad es muy baja, muchos genes no son probrados 
dentro de los que fueron creados.
Septimo Punto

import random
from pyeasyga import pyeasyga
import matplotlib
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

def create_individual(data):
    individual = data[:]
    random.shuffle(individual)
    return individual

def crossover(parent_1, parent_2):
    crossover_index = random.randrange(1, len(parent_1))
    child_1a = parent_1[:crossover_index]
    child_1b = [i for i in parent_2 if i not in child_1a]
    child_1 = child_1a + child_1b
    child_2a = parent_2[crossover_index:]
    child_2b = [i for i in parent_1 if i not in child_2a]
    child_2 = child_2a + child_2b
    return child_1, child_2

def mutate(individual):
    mutate_index1 = random.randrange(len(individual))
    mutate_index2 = random.randrange(len(individual))
    individual[mutate_index1], individual[mutate_index2] = individual[mutate_index2], individual[mutate_index1]


def selection(population):
    return random.choice(population)


def fitness (individual, data):
    collisions = 0
    for item in individual:
        item_index = individual.index(item)
        for elem in individual:
            elem_index = individual.index(elem)
            if item_index != elem_index:
                if item - (elem_index - item_index) == elem or (elem_index - item_index) + item == elem:
                    collisions += 1
    return collisions

def print_board(board_representation):
    def print_x_in_row(row_length, x_position):
        print('', end = '')
        for _ in range(row_length):
            print('---', end = '')
        print('\n|', end = '')
        for i in range(row_length):
            if i == x_position:
                print('{} |'.format('X'), end = '')
            else:
                print('  |', end = '')
        print('')

    def print_board_bottom(row_length):
        print('', end = '')
        for _ in range(row_length):
            print('---', end = '')

    num_of_rows = len(board_representation)
    row_length = num_of_rows  

    for row in range(num_of_rows):
        print_x_in_row(row_length, board_representation[row])

    print_board_bottom(row_length)
    print('\n', end = '')

def datos_generacion():
    fitness_po = [i.fitness for i in ga.current_generation]
    average = sum(fitness_po)/len(fitness_po)
    print("Fitness promedio:{} ".format(average))
    print("Mejor Individuo: {}".format(ga.best_individual()))
    return average

n =int(input('ingrese el numero de su representacion: '))
representacion = [i for i in range (n+1)] 
print("Representancion del problema de reinas:",representacion)

ga = pyeasyga.GeneticAlgorithm(representacion,
                            population_size=200,
                            generations=100,
                            crossover_probability=0.8,
                            mutation_probability=0.2,
                            elitism=True,
                            maximise_fitness=False)

ga.create_individual = create_individual
ga.crossover_function = crossover
ga.mutate_function = mutate
ga.selection_function = selection
ga.fitness_function = fitness  
ga.create_first_generation()
ga.run()

ejemplo1 = []

for i in range(1, 10):
    print("Generacion #{}".format(i))
    ga.create_next_generation()
    ejemplo1.append(datos_generacion())

print(ejemplo1)

labels = ['G1', 'G2', 'G3', 'G4', 'G5','G6', 'G7', 'G8', 'G9']
plt.plot(labels, ejemplo1,'o-')
plt.title('Evolución fitness n generico')
plt.xlabel('Generacion')
plt.ylabel('Fitness promedio')
plt.grid(True)
plt.show()
Octavo Punto
